questions.quote: "'Cause when he questioned me about it I was sweating from the Kom Pau.."

Are you sure? Oh, look who I'm talking to. The president of NBC.
George, it's time for us to grow up - and be men. Not little boys.
I got some Cubans for George's wedding. They were more than I wanted to pay for but what the hell!

Oh! Thank you. Thank you very much.  Really. I mean that. I am not one of those people who give insincere thank you's. No sir. No sir. When I thank someone I really thank them. So, thank... yoooou!
